Name: Coveted Shadow
Desc: Delivers a stealthy strike from the shadows. Direct Attack Skill hits create a chance of an additional attack. Remain in Dark Sight for a while to enhance it to Shadow Edge.

HFields.h1:
Direct Attack skill hits create a 60% chance of an additional attack that attacks at 150% Damage 2 times. Remain in Dark Sight for 9 sec. to enhance it to Shadow Edge.
Shadow Edge: Lasts for 3 sec. Direct Attack Skill hits create a 100% chance of a critical attack that attacks at 160% Damage 4 times. In Smoke Bomb range, first direct Attack Skill hit during Dark Sight instantly changes it to Shadow Edge.
